content: materials 2 skeins of purl soho s serif 2 100% pima cotton each skein is approximately 164 yards/100 grams - color a 1 skein approximately 45 total yards required - color b 1 skein approximately 40 yards required you will also need… - us 5 3 75 mm straight or 24-inch circular needles 3 - spare circular or double pointed needles 4 us 5 or smaller - a crochet hook 5 and scrap yarn for provisional cast on samples we knit our samples in summer melon + soft aloe heirloom white + turquoise tint alabaster cream + yellow haystack yellow ochre + heirloom white and gray birch + lemongrass green gauge 20 stitches and 40 row = 4 inches in garter stitch note the row gauge at the outer edge of the finished project stretches to 34 row per 4 inches due to the unique construction if you can get the gauge listed above in a flat swatch your pot holder will turn out just fine size finished dimensions 7 inches in diameter designed by purl soho designer hiromi glover 7 click here 8 to see even more of hiromi s work 2 https //www purlsoho com/serif html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796_23802 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles--double_pointed_needles html 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23805 7 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 8 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/
